Package com.github.jnstockley

Class Channel

java.lang.Object
com.github.jnstockley.Channel
public class Channel extends Object
Class that holds the data for each channel and helps with adding and removing channels
Version:
1.5
Author:
Jack Stockley

    • Channel

      public Channel​(org.json.simple.JSONObject json, boolean oldLiveStatus)
      Creates a channel object with the JSON response data from Twitch API and the old live status from the JSON config file
      Parameters:
      json - The JSON response data from the Twitch API
      oldLiveStatus - The old live status of the channel from the JSON config file
